name: Friends in a Facility
description:
This is my submission for GMTK Game Jam 2021. Its my first time here and i wanna keep it as simple as possible. Basically you and your friends are trapped in somewhat a facility of some sort. Kinda looks like a factory if you look closer in it. You and your friends must JOIN TOGETHER as a team and put your special abilities to the test solving medium or hard puzzles. I'm just gonna make a huge level with checkpoints cause i'm running out of time.

Here are controls :

Left and Right Arrows to move. Up Arrow to jump. Z,X,C,V to switch between characters.

Characters :

Red (Z) Normal Platformer Cube i suppose.

Blue (X) This guy-I mean girl, can jump pretty high.

Green (C) This guy's lazy, he's fast but jumps pretty low.

Yellow (V) This cube is pretty normal, except he falls pretty slow, like gliding i guess.

The game is unfinished but i will publish to see what people think so far.. If i won the jam or people like this game i might consider finishing it sometime later after the jame ends. Enjoy!!

- GM637

PS: Music by Filipo Game Audio (Youtube)
